Title: How Successful Leaders Solve Problems with Ryan Michler
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Ryan Michler, the founder of Order of Man. He shares a three-part framework for how successful leaders solve problems. Later in the episode, George chats with John Felkins, the senior director of coaching for EntreLeadership, about the stairsteps of influence. This framework will help you build trust and influence with your team.

You’ll learn:

  • Why having a framework is critical to problem-solving
  • How to effectively problem-solve with your team
  • How to empower your team to solve problems
  • How to build trust and influence with your team
